articles.title: Gigabyte Makes Bold Desktop Debut With AI-Driven PC Lineup at Computex
articles.description: DIY-centric computer maker Gigabyte showcases an expanded PC ecosystem that now includes pre-built desktop powerhouses for AI and gaming.

articles.title: Best smartwatches with ECG tracker: Top 7 options with accurate heart monitoring for healthy living
articles.description: Discover the best smartwatches with ECG tracker in 2025 for precise heart health monitoring and seamless fitness tracking on your wrist.

articles.title: From Rack Integration to AI and Cloud Systems: MSI Debuts Full-Spectrum Server Portfolio at COMPUTEX 2025
articles.description: /PRNewswire/ -- MSI, a global leader in high-performance server solutions, returns to COMPUTEX 2025 (Booth #J0506) with its most comprehensive lineup yet....

articles.title: New ROG and TUF Gaming components break cover at Computex 2025
articles.description: For Computex 2025, we're showing a wide range of new ASUS AMD motherboards, as well as dazzling new AIO CPU liquid cooler families.

articles.title: MSI’s new Claw A8 is powered by AMD
articles.description: MSI has taken the wraps off a new Claw A8 at Computex 2025. The PC gaming handheld comes with a Ryzen Z2 Extreme chip and up to 24GB of DDR5 memory.

articles.title: Acetate and gut bacteria work together to reduce obesity in mice
articles.description: Researchers led by Hiroshi Ohno at the RIKEN Center for Integrative Medical Sciences (IMS) in Japan have discovered a new way to reduce obesity.

articles.title: Hands On With BTF 2.5: Asus Solved the Big Problem With Cable-Free PC Builds
articles.description: Cable hiding for desktop PC builders has taken another twist with a new approach to graphics-card power delivery. I took a look inside Asus' newest version of its Back to the Future initiative.

articles.title: Apple iPhone 16 Plus review
articles.description: Bigger than the iPhone 16, the iPhone 16 Plus is more of what people want from an iPhone made for everyone: a bigger battery.

articles.title: The future of sound with the RØDE NTH-50 on-ear headphones
articles.description: RØDE has today unveiled the NTH-50 professional on-ear headphones, the latest addition to its award-winning headphone lineup.
